items.sentence: Is there somewhere we can talk privately about this?
Tom did that, even though he didn\'t really need to.
Tom didn\'t even say goodbye to Mary before he left.
French is the only language that I\'m able to speak.
Tom learned about Mary\'s death on the evening news.
I haven\'t gotten any email from Tom in a long time.
I hope Tom didn\'t do what Mary asked him not to do.
Tom is being very careful not to spill any gasoline.
Tom is better at French than most of his classmates.
Tom is in a better position to do that than Mary is.
Tom is likely to ask Mary for permission to do that.
Can you understand what the writer\'s trying to say?
My French isn\'t good enough to explain the problem.
We abandoned the project because of a lack of funds.
Tom wanted to become a professional baseball player.
Tom wanted to become a search-and-rescue specialist.
Tom wanted to get as far away from Mary as he could.
Tom wanted to know how to say "thank you" in French.
Tom wanted to know when Mary was going to come home.
When Tom comes, I\'ll pay the money that I promised.
